biotools.summary: Database of plasmids from genomes and metagenomes with rich annotations and metadata. It provides an extensive collection of plasmids, identified across thousands of isolate genomes, SAGs, MAGs, metagenomes, and metatranscriptomes using the geNomad tool. These plasmids are presented within a structured framework encompassing functional annotation and extensive metadata, which includes host taxonomy, similarity to other plasmids, geographic coordinates, and ecosystem information, allowing users to investigate plasmid function and ecology thoroughly.
